org.anarres.ipmi.protocol.packet.rmcp

Class RmcpHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.ipmi.protocol.packet.common.AbstractWireable
      • org.anarres.ipmi.protocol.packet.rmcp.RmcpHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Wireable

    public class RmcpHeader
extends AbstractWireable
    RMCP Packet Header. http://www.dmtf.org/sites/default/files/standards/documents/DSP0136.pdf http://www.dmtf.org/standards/asf Section 3.2.2.2 page 21.

        public int getWireLength()
        Description copied from interface: Wireable
        Returns the wire length of this packet. This must be exact, and not an overestimate.
